items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater
items.body: Well made, pretty, true to size Read more
items.author: Lab Lover

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit and color was good
items.body: Great material, color and style. A little big but how I wanted it. Read more
items.author: Susanne Giannetti

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater but this color felt oddly stiff
items.body: Nicely made, nice color (bright blue). I knocked off a star due to material feeling oddly stiff like the color was painted onto the fabric instead of being dyed. I have purchased 2 other colors and they are very soft as I expected for rayon from bamboo fabric. It is just the right in-between item to wear when a jacket is too much. Sizing is true to size, fit is just right to wear over a shirt whether long or short sleeves. I would/ have purchased more than one. Read more
items.author: rgrz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow!
items.body: I just got this sweater in Wine Red XL, so I haven't laundered it yet (I'll come back to this). But, out of the bag it is PERFECT. It's not at all bulky but it feels substantial. I LOVE the body skimming shape with ever-so-slightly generous fit through the armholes/arm-seam area (something nobody EVER gets right in larger sizes). I wish I could afford to buy every color RIGHT NOW. Still, I DO have the intense orange en route, and hope to buy another and another..., before they, predictably, start slowly running out, never to be offered again. I will say the fiber content is largely Viscose (Rayon), which retains color VERY well but requires particular care that the label does not have space to detail. I strongly recommend you research proper care of Viscose sweaters before attempting to clean, risking ruining the garment. Also, the label recommends hanging to dry - which is NEVER a good way to dry ANYTHING. Doing so with knits is a brilliant way to permanently wreck the shape of ANY stretchy garment. So, you can't hang this sweater to dry, nor can you toss it in the dryer (not even on "cool") so... How DO you dry it? Always air-dry sweaters/knits FLAT. If you don't have a mesh device on which to lay damp knits to DRY FLAT, I recommend buying one as you order this sweater. I got a hanging device that hangs in my shower, with 3 mesh tiers, from Amazon. It's perfect for flat-drying sweaters, tops and bras. Anyway, these are really lovely sweaters and should retain their color and shape for years, with proper care. Read more
items.author: Blossom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Garment
items.body: I purchased plus size but I don’t think that should matter. This is about quality for your money. In the same day I bought 2 plus sized sweaters, one from this brand the other from another brand, which was cheaper. I received the cheaper sweater in less than two days. It was fine, looked okay, wore it to work. Then about 10 days later I received this brands sweater. Wow! I was able to compare it to the cheaper sweater and saw this brand was a little longer, 1.5”-2.0”, which I didn’t realize looks better on me! The ribbing on the cuff was longer as well which I found more attractive. This brand uses bigger buttons compared to the small cheaper looking buttons on the other. The weight of the sweater was heavier than the other and the weave seemed finer. The v-neckline and fall of the sweater looked better on me. Overall, this sweater, although more expensive, was a better quality item. I decided to buy another color from this brand to see if the quality was consistent. Yes, it took about 8 days to arrive but same quality and fit. I have now decided to replace the basic black and blue sweaters I was using with new ones from this brand. One of the sweaters will arrive in 2 weeks, so weird, but I’m pretty sure I will be happy with quality of my new sweaters. I have not washed them yet but if I do it will be in the gentle cycle cold. Read more
items.author: Camlyn305

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love the sweaters, but they "pill" really badly
items.body: These sweaters are soft, fit true to size, really pretty colors (I have several!), they're the perfect light-weight for Fall/Winter in sunny Florida. My only complaint is that they 'pill' terribly. I wash them on delicate in a lingerie bag and hang to dry - but they pill with ANY friction; it's especially bad where my car seat belt touches my side. - they're all pilled up there. I'm not willing to handwash, so I just "shave" the pills off regularly with a disposable razor - hopefully they'll last a while. I love, love, love so much about these sweaters, but they all pill up really badly. Read more
items.author: DJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this sweater it fits perfect! Sleeves perfect length( I like them a little long).
items.body: I love this sweater! No complaints At all Read more
items.author: Tracy B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great style, nice fit
items.body: I've bought this cardigan in different colors, even giving 1 as a gift which was well received. I wear them all the time and love them. They have a fine weave, are very comfortable and they drape really nicely. It's a straightforward v-neck design and looks terrific on. It's not exactly a fitted cardigan but it certainly isn't boxy. They wash well and I've even tossed them in the dryer and they come out fine. A great cardigan for the price. I recommend them highly. Read more
items.author: Jen

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Apricot, Bright Orange, Purple Red, Black, Bright Green, Zebra Grey, Rose Red, Christmas Red, Hm Pink, Royal Blue, Light Purple, Pure Gray, Houndstooth Black, Purple Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
